argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | negidd.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | pncand.2 | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | subaddd.3 | |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | subcan2d.4 | |- ( ph -> ( A - C ) = ( B - C ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_subcan2 | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. CC ) -> ( ( A - C ) = ( B - C ) <-> A = B ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 5 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( A - C ) = ( B - C ) <-> A = B ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> A = B ) |
